seo.title: Travel Help | Brikette Hostel Positano
seo.description: Two-minute summary of how to reach us and where guests go next, with links to our full transport and excursion guides.

sections.title: Travel help at a glance
body: Start with our step-by-step How to Get Here guides for trains, ferries, private transfers, and what to do if delays happen. Most guests travel via Sorrento, so allow around 2 hours from Naples to Positano, buy SITA tickets before boarding, and message us if you are running late so we can plan your check-in.

sections.title: Quick directions for popular excursions
